description:
Refill your Thermacell repeller with hours of mosquito protection.

  • 6 square meter field of protection in 10–30 minutes
  • Each pod provides 36 hours of mosquito protection
  • Fully sealed and spill proof. Travel friendly design
  • Active ingredient: Metofluthrin
  • Only for use with Thermacell rechargeable repellers
name: Thermacell Rechargeable Mosquito Repellent Refills - 36 Hours
